p: Presence data: publicly available data from Global Biodiversity Information Facility (GBIF, http://www.gbif.org). Environmental data: publicly available data from http://climexp.knmi.nl/and http://www.esrl.noaa.gov/. Tree Ring Data: have been submitted to the International Tree Ring Data Bank and publicly available at: http://www.ncdc.noaa.gov/data-access/paleoclimatology-data/datasets/tree with access number ITAL045 and ITAL046 for Q. cerris and H. helix respectively. Cavitation data available from the Dryad Digital Repository: https://doi.org/10.5061/dryad.5688g40.
